Key Match Events: Daryl Mitchell's 43 off 31 balls was not enough to finish the chase
Tom Latham was the next man in with New Zealand needing just ten
Trent Boult took 3 wickets for 37 runs
Rachin Ravindra took 2 wickets for 21 runs
New Zealand won by 5 wickets (with 160 balls remaining)
Phillips nails the pull and seals the five-wicket win for New Zealand
New Zealand now have one leg in the semi-final with ten points
Pre-Game Insights: Kusal Mendis, Sri Lanka captain: 'First ten overs, we lost three-four wickets, hence we struggled with the bat'
Kane Williamson, New Zealand captain: 'Really good performance... early wickets and spin was challenging'
Trent Boult: 'Nice to get a bit of success at the top. A must-win game, the pleasure is about getting the result'
Rachin Ravindra to Star Sports: 'It's a pretty surreal feeling. Grateful for the support, especially playing in Bangalore. Crowd chanting my name is something I will never take for granted.'
Post-Match Reflections: Kusal Mendis: 'If we had a good partnership in the middle overs, we could have had 300+ on this wicket'
Kane Williamson: 'We expected the first [pitch vs Pakistan] like that but were not sure. We thought there will be a bit of weather but there was none'
Trent Boult: 'Always the biggest challenge of coming here is different conditions. Conditions have changed throughout'
Rachin Ravindra: 'Six to 12 months ago, I was not even in the frame. Good to get the job done and get into the playoffs'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The scenarios for both Pakistan and Afghanistan are next to impossible
New Zealand are safe. But they are back to winning ways
Hasan: 'This pending comprehensive victory for NZ has all but finished Pakistan's hopes of qualifying'
Waqas Ahmed: 'I didn't get why Chapman is out, It should Daryl Mitchell who left his crease, is there any change of rule recently?'
